title: Restrict Rooms search to unique room ID only

requirements.text: Update the Rooms page search so that filtering is performed only by the roomâ€™s unique ID (room.id) rather than by room name; searching must match an ID exactly (after trimming whitespace), and an empty query must show the full rooms list.

quotes: make the search that so that we can only search by using unique id

acceptanceCriteria: On frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx, the rooms filtering logic uses room.id (not room.name) when appliedSearchQuery is non-empty.
The search query is trimmed before applying; if the trimmed query is empty, all rooms are shown (no filtering).
Entering a room name that does not equal any room.id results in 0 matches (i.e., name-based partial matching no longer works).
Entering an exact room ID shows only the matching room card(s) (typically exactly one).

requirements.text: Update user-facing copy in the Rooms search dialog to clearly indicate the search input expects a room ID (unique ID), including dialog description and input placeholder text.

quotes: make the search that so that we can only search by using unique id

acceptanceCriteria: RoomsPage search dialog text no longer says "Find rooms by name" and instead describes searching by room ID in English.
RoomsPage search input placeholder no longer says "Search room names..." and instead prompts for a room ID in English.

requirements.text: Update the Rooms empty-state messaging so that when a non-empty room ID search returns no results, the helper text indicates no room was found for that ID (instead of suggesting trying a different search term generically).

quotes: make the search that so that we can only search by using unique id

acceptanceCriteria: When appliedSearchQuery is non-empty and filteredRooms is empty, the empty-state helper text references the entered ID (or clearly indicates it is an ID-based search) in English.
When appliedSearchQuery is empty, existing non-search empty-state behavior remains unchanged.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Do not modify immutable auth/actor hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not add backend endpoints or change backend storage for room search.
Do not implement searching by room name, location, or partial ID matching.
Do not add global search across areas beyond whatever rooms are already loaded for the current area selection.
